description:
Luffy is spared from a fiery death by an unlikely rescuer, but Ace refuses to leave Gray Terminal until he settles the score with Bluejam. Meanwhile, Sabo makes waves with a last ditch escape attempt!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jiyuu wa Doko ni Aru? Shounen no Kanashiki Funade
Où se trouve la liberté ? Le douloureux départ d`un jeune garçon
Where Can Freedom Be Found? A Sad Departure of a Boy!
Где же свобода? Грустный паренёк отправляется в плавание
自由はどこにある? 少年の悲しき船出
